category: About the Gender DEI Toolkit Volume III

content.text: The MARC Gender DEI Volume II Toolkit team would like to thank Sarah Khan and Dr. Amna Basharat for their continuous support. They would also like to acknowledge the work of Aamina Ghauri, Fatima Ahmed, Hania Imtinan, and Rafia Shahid in refining some of the material of Volume III. In addition to this, the Volume III team would also like to thank the Volume I team members, namely Ayesha Siddiqa, Javeria Jamil, Neeha Khan, and Razeen Fawad, and the Volume II members, namely Iman Fayyaz, Muiz Ahmad, Nabeeha Misbah and Sarah Sohail, for creating the foundations of Volume III.
